title: purandara vinuthE
sahitya:
purandhara vinutE puNDarEkSukANDa kOdaNDE



anupallavi



 niranjanE nirmalE nityE niSkaLE nirAmayE nishcalE nirguNE bAlE



caraNam



 kAmitArthava nIva kAmadhEnuvE ninna prEmavanu baDeda nishavu bhajisuva

 prEma bhaktaranella prEmadi poreyuva shyAmaLe harikEsha sati manOnmaNI
